add_entrypoint_object(
  ceil
  SRCS
    ceil.cpp
  HDRS
    ../ceil.h
  COMPILE_OPTIONS
    -O2
)

add_entrypoint_object(
  ceilf
  SRCS
    ceilf.cpp
  HDRS
    ../ceilf.h
  COMPILE_OPTIONS
    -O2
)

add_entrypoint_object(
  floor
  SRCS
    floor.cpp
  HDRS
    ../floor.h
  COMPILE_OPTIONS
    -O2
)

add_entrypoint_object(
  floorf
  SRCS
    floorf.cpp
  HDRS
    ../floorf.h
  COMPILE_OPTIONS
    -O2
)

  trunc
  SRCS
    trunc.cpp
  HDRS
    ../trunc.h
  COMPILE_OPTIONS
    -O2
)

add_entrypoint_object(
  truncf
  SRCS
    truncf.cpp
  HDRS
    ../truncf.h
  COMPILE_OPTIONS
    -O2
)

add_entrypoint_object(
  round
  SRCS
    round.cpp
  HDRS
    ../round.h
  COMPILE_OPTIONS
    -O2
)

add_entrypoint_object(

    roundf.cpp
  HDRS
    ../roundf.h
  COMPILE_OPTIONS
